description: This table stores whether a guided biopsy was performed.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GUIDED_BIOPSY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for whether a guided biopsy was performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
